tokens.text: performs smooth curve interpolation using Hermite basis

description: Interpolate points on a smooth curve using one of the Hermite Basis functions: `3t^2 - 2t^3`. While any valid float is a valid input, this function works best in the range `[0, 1]`.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Hermite Blend(value)
generated_doNotEdit.description: Useful for simple smooth curve interpolation using one of the Hermite Basis functions: `3t^2 - 2t^3`.  Note that while any valid float is a valid input, this function works best in the range [0,1].
